about_the_game:
Signs of Birth is "Roguelike Top down view Shooting Game".

- Simple operation: WASD and mouse
- No save point.



Heian era in Japan is around BC 1000. The people in Heian era believed the stranges.
Some people worked for the elimination of the stranges to protect the peace of society.
Hero's name is "Abeno Sansei". People talked about him who called as the third of "Abeno Seimei" the famous.
Hero should attack and eliminate all stranges to bring the peace and stability and to gain dignity and prestige.


Drop Items
- Experience: To gain Sign as level up bonus
- Sign: To draw cards
- Health pack: To add HP
- Soul: To reroll
- Magic Point: To add MP




Notice to Play
- When you can become to tame monster, right click to place a trap and touch the trapped monster to tame.


Backstory:
During the turbulent Heian era around AC 1000, Japan was plagued by political turmoil and supernatural unrest. “Abe no Sansei”, a genius onmyoji known as a master of mystical arts, is at the forefront of a secret battle against monsters that threaten to throw his country into chaos.

It is rumored that ``Abe no Seimei'' is the grandson of Abe no Seimei, but his birth is unknown. It is said that he surpasses even the legendary figure in the field of fighting monsters.
And additionally by using "signs" he can acquire various abilities. It is said that he surpasses even legendary figures.


Amidst whispers of the return of an ancient evil and dark intrigues within the imperial court, Sanyo Abe discovers a forbidden ritual that gives her the ability to make pacts with monsters. Through his innate connection to the spirit world and deep understanding of esoteric lore, he learns to tame and command these creatures by sign, bending their terrifying powers to his will.

Enhanced by this newly acquired ability, “Abe no Sansei” becomes not only a warrior, but also a shadow summoner. The Shadow is a spiritual being born of his own mind and a duplicate of his powers. These shadow allies will appear as loyal allies and can be used to your advantage in battle.

Known for his loyalty to the Emperor and his mastery of both martial and mystical arts, “Abe no Sansei” is tasked with uncovering the secrets of intrigue swirling within the Imperial Court and thwarting its insidious plans. His pursuit continues from the elegant corridors of the imperial palace to the outskirts of the capital. There, abandoned temples, forgotten shrines, and abandoned mansions that were once home to elegant aristocrats have become sanctuaries for monsters that bring various misfortunes.

As “Abe no Sansei” delves deeper into the conspiracy, he must uncover a web of deception among bureaucrats and national defenders, each with their own agenda and allegiances. His enemies include a skilled assassin, a corrupt courtier, and someone who controls monsters. However, there is currently insufficient evidence to catch those behind such a conspiracy, and Abe Sansei himself lacks political power.


Caught up in political intrigue and supernatural struggles, “Abe no Sansei” must confront her own dangerous inner demons. As the conflict escalates, he grapples with the ethical dilemmas of wielding power and making the sacrifices necessary to protect his country from both human and supernatural threats.

“Abe no Sansei” takes on a horde of monsters in an abandoned mansion that is both a base of intrigue and a stronghold of monsters.
He believes that attacking the hordes of monsters will lead to eradication of the conspiracy and peace and prosperity of their country.

name: Signs of Birth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i series, AMD Ryzen series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i series, AMD Ryzen series
  • Graphics: Geforce 2070 Super
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Signs of Birth is "Roguelike Top down view Shooting Game". We will defeat the enemies stage by stage. You can draw a few cards according to the points you earned, and you can strengthen your character with the cards. You can try building with cards, and you can also have fun dodging bullet hell.
